DOC.brief_summary: The purpose observational Post-Market Surveillance Registry gather post-market data performance CE mark Vascutek Anaconda™ Stent Graft System repair Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms ( AAA ) . The Study population consist patient suitable endovascular repair AAA . Patients follow 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 , 24 , 36 , 48 60 month post-implantation .
DOC.brief_title: Vascutek Anaconda™ Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm ( AAA ) Post-Market Surveillance Registry
DOC.detailed_description: Vascutek Limited , world leader development vascular graft , combine late technological development polyester textile technology unique endovascular design feature produce Anaconda™ , world 's next generation AAA stent graft system . Intuitive modular design , Anaconda™ repositionable device also feature exceptional flexibility . The modular design comprise bifurcate body , iliac legs aortic cuff . Nitinol , alloy nickel titanium , self-expanding property form top `` ring-stent '' bifurcate body section . The `` ring stent '' compose multiple turn Nitinol wire provide significantly increase `` hoop-strength '' enable conformable secure haemostatic seal vessel wall achieve . Nitinol hook locate adjacent `` ring stent '' anchor graft position thus prevent graft migration . The iliac limb fully support Nitinol bifurcate body feature distal contra-lateral lumen Nitinol support , conjunction unique intrinsic magnet guidewire system facilitate cannulation bifurcate section . The system available wide range size thus make flexible adaptable stent graft system potential repair diverse patient anatomy .
DOC.criteria: Patient implant Anaconda™ Stent Graft System Ruptured symptomatic aneurysm Juxta Suprarenal extension aneurysm Clinically serious concomitant medical disease infection Need sacrifice Internal Iliac Arteries due aneurysmal dilatation Connective Tissue Disease ( Marfan 's Syndrome ) ASA Rating Grade IV V Known allergy Nitinol , Polyester contrast medium Excessive tortuosity access vessel ( femoral iliac artery ) Patients aneurysm neck length le 15mm
